Name: Anil Kumar
AboutMe:
Clear oops and RDBMS concepts.

Practically using design patterns and architectural patterns. Supporter of TDD and CI or, if not possible then at least unit testing should be integral part of development process.

Promote peer code review practice.

During my post graduation after learning oops and RDBMS concepts, I have learned many languages like C, C++, Visual Basic, Basic, DBase, Foxpro, Pascal, FORTRAN and COBOL. My final project was to develop a shooting game in C language and I was succeeded to make shoot from keyboard up-arrow by a * to floating blocks.

As on today I have experience on many languages (C#, Python, VB.net, ASP.net, HTML, XML, Javascript and PHP, T-SQL, PL/SQL, SQL/PSM, SAP HANA and ASP)

I have worked on the popular frameworks like .net, ASp.net MVC, WCF, Jquery, Dganjo, Django- REST, ASP net Web API, Symfony, nUnit, Angularjs

Worked on MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, SAP-HANA and Preferred IDE is MS-Visual Studio becasue Code Analyze Tools and Profiler is doing very productive for me.

Be it Overseas client, my Indian Govt or internal team members, I know that they all like me.

Enjoy leading teams to deliver quality and end-to-end solutions to customers.

They call me Technical Architect.
